{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Discordant Igna |image = |caption = Discordant Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 44
96-98 |area = [[Elaice Highway]] ([[Nid Cave]])
[[Erythia Sea]] ([[Rebellion Cave]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Discordant Ignas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 44 in [[Nid Cave]] on [[Elaice Highway]], or at level 96-98 in [[Rebellion Cave]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} == In {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Discordant Igna |image = Discordant Igna FR.jpg |caption = Discordant Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 44 |area = [[Black Mountains]] ([[Raxeal Lavaflow]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Discordant Ignas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 44 at [[Raxeal Lavaflow]] on the [[Black Mountains]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{Fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Black Mountains Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Ignas]] [[Category:XC3FR Ignas]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 96-100 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Disparre Skwaror |image = XC3 Disparre Skwaror.png |caption = Disparre Skwaror |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemy]] |type = [[Skwaror]] |level = 20 |area = [[Dannagh Desert (XC3)|Dannagh Desert]] ([[Ypsil Hill]]) |spawntime = During ''[[Champion of the Nopon]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Disparre Skwarors''' are [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive Enemies]] in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Skwaror]] family, with three being encountered at level 20 on [[Ypsil Hill]] in [[Dannagh Desert (XC3)|Dannagh Desert]] during ''[[Champion of the Nopon]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 DLC Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Skwarors]] [[Category:XC3 Level 16-20 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Disperse Bloodlust | image = Gem-speciality.png | effect = [Passive] Reduces aggro generated when using Art by ''(value)%''. | category = Speciality | max = 45% }} '''Disperse Bloodlust''' is a Speciality [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Aggro Decrease |- !I |20% |- !II |22% |- !III |25% |- !IV |27% |- !V |30% |- !VI |32% |- !VII |35% |- !VIII |37% |- !IX |40% |- !X |45% |} == List of Recipes == At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. '''Divining Hairgrips''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]]

{{Infobox quest |name = Doing It My Way |image = Doing It My Way.jpg |description = "On the Erythia Sea, the party finds itself going head-to-head with a Moebius who goes by the name of Triton." |giver = [[Triton]] |location = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Hargan Point]]) |time = |prereqs = [[Ishan Isle]] visited |reclevel = Lv. 46 |rewards = 400 [[Colony 15]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
3320 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
3230 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Triton]] as a [[Hero]] }} '''Doing It My Way''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Triton]]. == Objectives == # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* [[Ronja]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Delit Gyaark]] (4) # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* Ronja # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* [[Lhukavu]] # ''Hold a discussion at a rest spot.'' #* Booty? # ''Collect the specified thing(s).'' #* [[Yum-Yum Coconut]] #* [[Ancient Taos Fossil]] #* [[Millennial Tree Amber]] # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* Lhukavu # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* [[Kio]] # ''Investigate the specified object(s).'' #* Footprints # ''Follow the trail.'' #* Monster Tracks #* Monster Tracks # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Arcaphor Gogol]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony 15]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Triton#Battle|Defiant Triton]] #* [[Torto]] #* [[Pergas]] #* [[Orson]] == Results == ''"Triton had long wanted to free his friends from the Flame Clock's grip. The party, though initially reluctant, have let him join their ranks."'' {{clr}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:Triton]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Quests]]

{{for|the status in ''Xenoblade Chronicles 2''|Doom (XC2)}} '''Doom''' is a status effect in {{XC3}}. When applied, it instantly kills the afflicted character. If applied against [[Interlink]]ed characters, they will immediately enter Overheated status. All [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]]es, [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]]s and [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemies]] are immune to Doom, but it works against [[Normal Monster]]s and [[Elite Monster]]s. It is comparable to [[Instant Death]] from [[Xenoblade Chronicles|the first game]].
== Distribution == === Arts === * [[Dimension Ripper]] === Skills === * An unnamed skill in Noah's [[Unlimited Sword]] stance when he assumes an [[Attacker]] role gives him a 3% chance to inflict Doom on each hit. === Enemy-only Arts === * Ultra Play Bite ([[Seraphic Ceratinia]]; Lv 125 or higher) * Farewell, My Puppet ([[Moebius J]]) * Crazed Headhunt ([[Moebius X]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Doomfang Caum |image = Doomfang Caum.png |caption = Doomfang Caum |type = [[Feris]] |level = 50 |area = [[Rae-Bel Tableland]] ([[Pinasa Highland]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = 1,462 |cp = 364 |sp = 5 |gold = 920 |hp = 1,467,200 |strength = 884 |healing = 292 |dexterity = 176 |agility = 142 |physdef = 5% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 23% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Doomfang Caum''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Feris]] family, and can be found at level 50 at the [[Pinasa Highland]] of [[Rae-Bel Tableland]]. The Megashout [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] for defeating it.
== Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |physdebuff = 25% |etherdebuff = 80% |knockback = 75% |blowdown = 75% }}
== Item Drops == == Gallery == <gallery> Doomfang caum location.png Doomfang caum.png </gallery>
[[Category:XC3 Level 46-50 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:XC3 Feris]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

revision.comment: add all missing data from reconstruction (this can be easily found on the QST tables in datamine)
revision.text:
{{Spoiler}} '''Dorrick''' is a special [[Levnis]] in {{XC3}} that is gradually built across 10 stages by [[Valdi]] and the [[Nopon]] of [[Colony 30]]. The project is initiated in ''[[Big Friendly Friend]]'' and is completed in ''[[The Final Cog]]''. The stages of Dorrick are advanced by giving [[Repapa]] the desired materials and doing the occasional quest. It is controlled through [[Mechafriend]]. During the unveiling of the completed Dorrick, it is taken over by [[Pulipuli]], who unleashes it on the party. == Dorrick Project Phases == |-|Phase 3 = After progress reaches 100%, ''[[Missing Parts]]'' must be completed. {| class="xc1" ! Name ! Materials ! Gain |- | Parched Jalapenjet | [[Parched Branch]] x3

[[Surge Circuit]] x5 | +15% |- | Hornedrum | [[Giant Hornet Fossil]] x3

It is a [[Levnis]] controlled by [[Pulipuli]], and is fought at level 70 in the [[Terra Wastelands]] in [[Ribbi Flats]] during ''[[The Final Cog]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Levnises]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Doublestrike | image = Gem-speciality.png | effect = [Passive] Adds ''(value)%'' chance to strike twice per auto-attack. | category = Speciality | max = 40% }} '''Doublestrike''' is a Speciality [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Activation Rate |- !I |15% |- !II |17% |- !II |20% |- !IV |22% |- !V |25% |- !VI |27% |- !VII |30% |- !VIII |32% |- !IX |35% |- !X |40% |} == List of Recipes == At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. |-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Dragonfang Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking enemies targeting you by 25%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 10690 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Dragonfang Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking enemies targeting you by 26%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 10690 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Dragonfang Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking enemies targeting you by 27%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 10690 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Dragonfang Necklaces''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|the similar families of enemies in other games|Dragon (XC1)|Draigul}} [[File:Umber Drague.jpg|thumb|210px|A Drague]] '''Dragues''' are a family of monsters in {{XC3}}. They resemble the [[Dragon (XC1)|Dragons]] from {{XC}} and [[Draigul]]s from {{XC3FR|sublink}}.
== List of Enemies == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Yolmun Drague]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Dreadwyrm Nizoont]] ([[Superboss]])
=== Boss === * [[Umber Drague]] {{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Dragues]] [[Category:XC3 Terrestrial Life]] [[Category:XC3 Aerial Life]] [[Category:Dragues]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Dreadwyrm Nizoont |image = Dreadwyrm Nizoont.jpg |caption = Dreadwyrm Nizoont |type = [[Drague]] |level = 105 |area = [[Low Maktha Wildwood]] ([[Forgotten Trick Gate]]) |category = [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] ([[Superboss]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 13,480 |cp = 370 |sp = 25 |gold = 8,160 |hp = 11,767,400 |strength = 2,862 |healing = 649 |dexterity = 463 |agility = 284 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 45% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Dreadwyrm Nizoont''' is one of the [[Superboss]]es in {{XC3}}. It is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] and a member of the [[Drague]] family, and can be found at level 105 behind the [[Forgotten Trick Gate]] at the end of the [[Cavern of Oblivion]] in [[Low Maktha Wildwood]]. Dreadwyrm Nizoont guards the pedestal where the [[Legendary Biter]] is located on. The Hot Soul [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] when defeating it. Through re-challenging, Dreadwyrm Nizoont's level can increase to a maximum at level 170. == Battle == ===Skills=== Dreadwyrm Nizoont has the following innate skills: *Boosts damage from Blaze by 200%. *Boosts damage when attacking Dazed enemies by 50%. *Extends Topple duration by 50%. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 105% |topple = 0% |daze = 0% |burst = 0% |launch = 0% |smash = 0% |blowdown = Immune |knockback = Immune |physdebuff = 65% |etherdebuff = 90% }} {{clr}} === Enraged === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:70%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |style="text-align:left;"|Boosts damage dealt by 25%.
Boosts Art recharge speed by 25%.
Adds 100% chance to strike twice per auto-attack. |} ===Arts=== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:150%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes !Use Conditions |- |'''''Auto-Attack''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |220% | |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 25%. |Anytime |- |rowspan="2"|'''Crushing Bite''' |rowspan="2"|Physical |rowspan="2"|One Target |rowspan="2"|1 |600% | [[Phys Def Down (XC3)|Phys. Def. Down]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 75%. | Anytime during Lv 105 fight |- | 700% | Phys. Def. Down / [[Bleed (XC3)|Bleed]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 75%. *Damage from Bleed is boosted by 300%. | Anytime during fights at Lv 110 or above; may be used more frequently at Lv 140 or above |- |rowspan="2"|'''Tail Swipe''' |rowspan="2"|Physical |rowspan="2"|Frontward AOE |rowspan="2"|1 |rowspan="2"|160% |[[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] / Bleed |style="text-align:left;"| | Anytime during fights up to and including Lv 125 |- |[[Daze (XC3)|Daze]] / Bleed |style="text-align:left;"| *Daze duration is extended by 100%. | Anytime during fights at Lv 130 or above |- |rowspan="2"|'''Heat Scream''' |rowspan="2"|Clear Debuffs |rowspan="2"|Self |rowspan="2"| - |rowspan="2"| - | [[Attack Up]] / [[Invincible (XC3)|Invincible]] |rowspan="2" style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to all reactions and combos during Art. *Duration of ''debuffs applied to enemies'' is extended by 50%. |Anytime during Lv 105-160 fights |- | [[Awakening (XC3)|Awakening]] / Invincible |Anytime during Lv 170 fight |- |rowspan="2"|'''Mighty Gale''' |rowspan="2"|Ether |rowspan="2"|Frontward AOE |rowspan="2"| 3 |rowspan="2"| 180% | [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] on all hits |style="text-align:left;"| *Critical Rate is boosted by 25%. *Immune to all reactions and combos during Art. |When reduced to 40% HP during Lv 105-160 fights |- | Knockback on first two hits; [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]] on third hit | style="text-align:left;"| *Critical Rate is boosted by 25%. *Immune to all reactions and combos during Art. *Negates enemy guard; inflicts [[Break (XC3)|Break]] if guard is attempted. |When reduced to 40% HP during Lv 170 fight |- |rowspan="2"|'''Infernal Flame''' |rowspan="2"|Ether |rowspan="2"|Frontward AOE |3 |450% |rowspan="2"|[[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] |rowspan="2" style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 25%. *Ignores enemy defense. *Each hit can only damage a single target in range. |When reduced to 80% HP during fights up to and including Lv 115 |- |4 |640% |When reduced to 80% HP during fights at Lv 120 or above |} === Superboss Challenges === After defeating it for the first time, Dreadwyrm Nizoont can be re-fought at increasing levels by selecting the "Challenge" option on its [[Named Grave]]. After defeating it at a given challenge level, it will appear at the next challenge level the next time it is challenged, until reaching its maximum level. Thus, only the initial Lv 105 version and the final Lv 170 challenge version can be refought. Dreadwyrm Nizoont has the following stats changed from its base Lv 105 version in each challenge version. Physical and Ether Defense, Critical Rate, Guard Rates and resistances are unchanged in these challenge versions. SP is not dropped from defeating it in a challenge, since the challenge counts as a refight. Lv 110=

Lv 110

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 20,145,000 |atk = 3,845 |heal = 1,050 |dex = 630 |agil = 387 |exp = 26,480 |cp = 490 |gold = 11,560 }} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Dreadwyrm Nizoont |image = |caption = Dreadwyrm Nizoont |type = [[Drague]] |level = 170 |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Boss]] |spawntime = During ''[[The Four Devas]]'' |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = |hp = 5,302,875 |strength = 1,035 |healing = 1,050 |dexterity = 605 |agility = 367 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 5% |guardrate = 0% }} Dreadwyrm Nizoont is fought at level 170 during the third wave of the [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] ''[[The Four Devas]]''. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 90% |topple = 0% |daze = 0% |burst = 0% |launch = 0% |smash = 0% |blowdown = Immune |knockback = Immune |physdebuff = 90% |etherdebuff = Immune }} {{clr}} == Gallery == Dreadwyrm nizoont location.png Dreadwyrm nizoont.png [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Dragues]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

revision.comment: battle stats (this particular enemy is known as the bane of speedrunners, and also hard mode players)
revision.text:
{{spoiler}} {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Drifter Ropl |image = |caption = Drifter Ropl |category = Story Exclusive Enemy |type = [[Ropl]] |level = 6 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]] ([[Alfeto Valley Mouth]]) |spawntime = Story |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 64 |cp = 34 |sp = 0 |gold = 0 |hp = 10,600 |strength = 66 |healing = 17 |dexterity = 28 |agility = 25 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 5% |guardrate = 0% }} The '''Drifter Ropl''' is a [[Story Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Story Exclusive Enemy]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Ropl]] family, and is fought at level 6 at the [[Alfeto Valley Mouth]] in [[Alfeto Valley]] during Chapter 1. After the Drifter Ropl is defeated, [[Mwamba]] leaves the party. == Battle == ===Resistances=== {{XC3 Resistances |knockback = 50% |blowdown = 50% }} {{clr}} === Arts === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:150%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes |- <!-- Auto-attack --> |'''Auto-Attack''' |Physical |One Target |1 |100% | | |- <!-- Arts Slot 0 --> |'''Cursed Cuisine''' |Physical |Frontward AOE |1 |300% | |style="text-align:left;"|Immune to all combos and reactions during Art animation. |- <!-- Arts Slot 1 --> |'''Komodo Fire''' |Ether |One Target |1 |450% |[[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] |style="text-align:left;"|Immune to [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] and [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] during Art. |- <!-- Arts Slot 3 (Arts Slot 2 appears to be unused by the AI) --> |'''Double Bite''' |Physical |One Target |2 |200% | | |}
